description:
TOGAF is The Open group Architecture Framework. It delivers a framework for architecture on business, Information systems and infrastructure architecture.

We ship a personal course attendance certificate if you have followed the complete course.

In order to get TOGAF certified you need to pass two exams, level 1 and level 2. This course is a preparation for both exams. The real exam costs around 320 USD so for this small price your can get a good practice experience. It contains 80 practice questions for the foundation level (that is 2 full exams) and it contains 8 certified questions of the same type and level then the real exam.

For the certified level each question is discussed in a video for deeper understanding.

Besides that the course contains additional material, like how get access to the TOGAF book, and other Enterprise Architecture materials.
title: Become TOGAF Certified with exam preparation for L1 + L2
